entries.question: I have a complain about my store. What can I do?
entries.questionInEng: I have a complain about my store. What can I do?
entries.answer: We're sorry to hear that.Don't hesistate to go to the reception of your store and ask for the shop manager or Customer Responsible. You can also contact our Customer Care Team by calling the 0800/95 713 or by filling in the contactform on our website.

entries.question: I have a quality issue with a product. What can I do?
entries.questionInEng: I have a quality issue with a product. What can I do?
entries.answer: We're sorry to hear that! May we kindly invite you to bring the product/ or packaging back to the store. If possible with your ticket. Bringing the product back gives us the possibility to sent it to our quality department for investigation. Of course, your product will be refunded. If you don't have the product or ticket anymore, please contact our customer service team (0800/95 713 or through the webform).They'll help you further.

entries.question: I'd like to make a suggestion or a remark
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to make a suggestion or a remark
entries.answer: We'd love to hear your suggestion! This will help us to improve our services. Please click here to do so.

entries.question: How can I know if a product is available in my store?
entries.questionInEng: How can I know if a product is available in my store?
entries.answer: Although all assortments are much alike, every store is still unique. That's why some products are only available in certain stores. Don't hesitate to contact your store if you want a specific product. You can find all our store phone numbers here.

entries.question: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.questionInEng: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.answer: Indeed, we do sponsor some local charity projects but only with products. If you want to introduce a sponsoring request, please click here. If you want to sponsor a local non-profit organzation, click here. We'll contact you as soon as possible. ici … Si vous souhaitez soutenir une asbl locale (club de sport, ...), cliquez ici. Nous reviendrons vers vous le plus rapidement possible.

entries.question: Can I find the same assortment online than in the stores?
entries.questionInEng: Can I find the same assortment online than in the stores?
entries.answer: We'll do our best to fit all our customers' needs. Most of all products are also available online, but the online assortment is a little smaller than instore.

entries.question: Where can I find the opening hours of my store?
entries.questionInEng: Where can I find the opening hours of my store?
entries.answer: For all our opening hours or if you want some informations about the store, click here.

entries.question: Is there a Delhaize Shop in my neighbourhood?
entries.questionInEng: Is there a Delhaize Shop in my neighbourhood?
entries.answer: Of course you can! You can find all our stores by clicking here. Select a store or just type your address to find the nearest store.

entries.question: Which services are available in my store?
entries.questionInEng: Which services are available in my store?
entries.answer: Please click here for additional informations.

entries.question: I'd like to sell some charity products at the enterence of your store. Who do I need to  contact?
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to sell some charity products at the enterence of your store. Who do I need to  contact?
entries.answer: You can make a request at the reception of your store. The sotre manager will help you further.

entries.question: I'd like to work for somedomain. What do I need to do?
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to work for somedomain. What do I need to do?
entries.answer: That's great news! You can find all our vacancies on following platform. We'll keep our fingers crossed for your application!

entries.question: I'd like to become a Delhaize supplier. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to become a Delhaize supplier. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: We'd love to hear more about your product. Please fill in this webform; our product managers will contact you afterwards.

entries.question: I have a document request (f.e invoice). Who do I need to contact?
entries.questionInEng: I have a document request (f.e invoice). Who do I need to contact?
entries.answer: You can ask for your document at the reception of the store. Please provide purchase date and  purchase details such as method of payement and amount of the ticket.

entries.question: How can I get a copy of my ticket?
entries.questionInEng: How can I get a copy of my ticket?
entries.answer: You can ask for your document at the reception of the store. Please provide purchase date and  purchase details such as method of payement and amount of the ticket.

entries.question: Can I find the same assortment online than in the stores?
entries.questionInEng: Can I find the same assortment online than in the stores?
entries.answer: We'll do our best to fit all our customers' needs. Most of all products are also available online, but the online assortment is a little smaller than instore.

entries.question: How can I shop on somedomain.be?
entries.questionInEng: How can I shop on somedomain.be?
entries.answer: It's really easy! Go to www.somedomain.be. Click on the tab "Register or logg in". If you don't have an account yet, please create one by clicking on "Register". If you have an account already, just logg in and click on "Start Shopping". First you need to choose if you want your order to be delivered at your local store for pick up (= collect), or if you want a home delivery service. After that, you need to choose a delivery date/hour. Now you can start filling your shopping card. If you want to now if we delivery in your neighbourhood, please click here.

entries.question: Do you have a home delivery service?
entries.questionInEng: Do you have a home delivery service?
entries.answer: yes we do! We actually have two kind of services : You can choose between a home delivery service and a collect in store service. With a collect service, your order will be delivered in your local store at the time you've chosen. All you have to do is picking it up. If you want to now if we delivery in your neighbourhood, please click here.

entries.question: How do I use my promotion code for my online order?
entries.questionInEng: How do I use my promotion code for my online order?
entries.answer: It's realy easy! you need to introduce your code when you're on your basket page. There's a special field dedicated for promotion codes. Click to validate. Once your code is introduced, you can confirm your order. If you have a problem, don't hesitate to call our customer service (0800/95 713) or to contact them through the webform.

entries.question: What happens if a product I ordered is unavailable?
entries.questionInEng: What happens if a product I ordered is unavailable?
entries.answer: Our store employee will propose you a substitute product. You're free to accept it or not.

entries.question: Do I need to pay preparation costs for an online order?
entries.questionInEng: Do I need to pay preparation costs for an online order?
entries.answer: Depending on the timeslot you've chosen, preparation costs for in store pick-up orders are between 3€ and 4,5€. Alhtough, if your purchase amount exceeds 150€, you'll get free preparation costs. Please also check the weekly product that gives you free preparation costs. By adding this product to your basket, the preparation costs will be free of charge, even if you don't have the 150€ amount. Please also note that there are the preparation costs are free for your first order.

entries.question: Are there delivery  costs for Home Delivery orders?
entries.questionInEng: Are there delivery  costs for Home Delivery orders?
entries.answer:
Standard costs for home delivery is  € 9,95.
But if you add the product of the week in your basket, you'll have a 4,5€ discount on it.
important to know : If you order by phone, a call-center fee of 5€ will be applied. If you order more that 60L of drinks, there will also be an additional fee of 10€.

entries.question: Howmany products do I have to order for  2+1 or 1+1 promotions?
entries.questionInEng: Howmany products do I have to order for  2+1 or 1+1 promotions?
entries.answer: You need to select the total number of products. So if the promotion is 2+1 , you need to order 3 products. If it's a 1+1 you need to add 2 products in your basket. The free product will be deducted from your ticket.

entries.question: Can I order for a pick-up or delivery the same day?
entries.questionInEng: Can I order for a pick-up or delivery the same day?
entries.answer: Unfortunately it's not possible for the same day. But you can order till midnight the day before.

entries.question: Can I pick-up my order later than the timeslot I've chosen?
entries.questionInEng: Can I pick-up my order later than the timeslot I've chosen?
entries.answer: If you want to modify your timeslot, please logg in and go to your order history. Click on your ongoing order and click on "modify". Watch out : an order can only be modified till 10:00AM the day before the delivery/pick up. IF you want to modify it after that time, we kindly invite you to contact your store. You can find all our store numbers here.

entries.question: How can I pay my order?
entries.questionInEng: How can I pay my order?
entries.answer: you have several possibilities.You can pay by card (Barncontact, Visa, Master Card or American Express. You can also pay with electronic mealvouchers. You can't pay home delivery orders by cash nor with ecocheques.

entries.question: Can I use discount voucher on my online order?
entries.questionInEng: Can I use discount voucher on my online order?
entries.answer: Yes you can. You just have to give your voucher to our store employee when you pick up your order. The voucher will directly be deducted from your ticket. Same thing for Home deliveries : just give your voucher to the driver and he will deduct it from your ticket. Only Delhaize vouchers, suppliers' vouchers and 5€ vouchers are accepted. It's not possible for our drivers to give a 5€ voucher when 500 points are targetted. THerefor you need to go to a store.

entries.question: How can I replace an old order?
entries.questionInEng: How can I replace an old order?
entries.answer: You can add all the products of a previous order into your basket by logging in and by going into your order history. Open the order you want to "copy". You can re-add all the products in your basket, or you can just "replace the order". It's that easy! :-)

entries.question: How can I remove a product from my shopping card
entries.questionInEng: How can I remove a product from my shopping card
entries.answer: To remove a product from your shopping list, just logg into your account and click onthe part « My lists » .Click on "view list". you'll have the possibility to remove or to add some products.  It's that easy!

entries.question: Where can I check my order history?
entries.questionInEng: Where can I check my order history?
entries.answer: You can check your order history in your account. Please logg in and go to "My orders". You'll have all the overview of your placed orders.

entries.question: I forgot my password. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I forgot my password. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: Don't worry, all you need to do is go to the delhaize website and click on "Register/logg in". On the left side, you'll see "Existing customer" and "Forgot password?". Click on that last one. An email with further instructions will be send immediatly to your personal emailaddress.

entries.question: How do I make an online shopping list?
entries.questionInEng: How do I make an online shopping list?
entries.answer: If you buy some products quiete frequently, you might save them in a list. This will save your time for your next order. Once you have those products into your basket, you can click on "save as list". Later on, if you want to re-order those products, just open the list you've saved and add the products into your basket. It's that easy!

entries.question: How can I replace an old order?
entries.questionInEng: How can I replace an old order?
entries.answer: You can add all the products of a previous order into your basket by logging in and by going into your order history. Open the order you want to "copy". You can re-add all the products in your basket, or you can just "replace the order". It's that easy! :-)

entries.question: What are E-Deals? How does it work?
entries.questionInEng: What are E-Deals? How does it work?
entries.answer: E-Deals are promotions that can only be activated on your loyalty card. All you have to do is create an online account and link your loyalty card to it. Once your card linked, you'll recieve your  personalized offers (Edeals). Click on "activate your edeal" to activate the promotion on your card. Next time you'll go tho the store, present your card at the cashier and the promotion will be directly deducted.

entries.question: Are all the online commercial actions  the same as in the stores?
entries.questionInEng: Are all the online commercial actions  the same as in the stores?
entries.answer: Most of our instore commercial actions and promotions are also applicable for oneline orderings. Although some local actions might only be applicated in some local stores. But it could be the other way around too : some promotions are only applicable for online orderings. Most commercial actions are not applicable for home delivery services.

entries.question: I can't logg in
entries.questionInEng: I can't logg in
entries.answer: Please contact our customer service at following number : 0800 95 713 or you can fill in our webform. We'll fix it for you!

entries.question: How can I link my card to my online account?
entries.questionInEng: How can I link my card to my online account?
entries.answer: You can do it online through your webaccount; Or you can contact our customer service by phone (0800/95 713) or by webform.

entries.question: I didn't recieve my points
entries.questionInEng: I didn't recieve my points
entries.answer: Please go to the receptiondesk of your store or contact our customer service team (0800/95 713 or by webform). They'll fix it for you.

entries.question: Where can I order a Delhaize Loyalty card?
entries.questionInEng: Where can I order a Delhaize Loyalty card?
entries.answer: You have two possibilities to order your card : You can go to the reception desk of your store and ask for a loyalty card. Or you can order one online. Just loggin to your webaccount and click on "order a pluscard". You'll get your card at home within the 10 days.

entries.question: I've lost my Loyalty Card. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I've lost my Loyalty Card. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: You can ask a new card at the receptiondesk of your store. If you have your old (lost) loyalty card number, they can transfer your balance of points. If you don't know you old(lost) number anymore, don't worry. Feel free to contact our Customer Service by phone 0800/95 713 or by webform....they'll help you further.

entries.question: I have several Loyalty Cards. How can I add all points on one card?
entries.questionInEng: I have several Loyalty Cards. How can I add all points on one card?
entries.answer: Yes you can. Please contact our customer service by phone (0800/95 713) or by webform. They'll take care of merging all your cards.

entries.question: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.questionInEng: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.answer: You can go to the reception desk of your store and ask our employee to modify your details. (Please bring your loyalty card). You can also modify all your details yourself if you have an online account and your card linked to it. All you have to do is to logg in, go to "My account" /My personal details.

entries.question: How and where can I check my balance of points?
entries.questionInEng: How and where can I check my balance of points?
entries.answer: You have twe possibilites to check your balance of points . Your balance of points is always mentioned at the end of your ticket. Otherwise, you can also check it online once your card has been linked to your account.

entries.question: I want to cancel my card. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I want to cancel my card. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: You have two options : You can go to the receptiondesk of your store or you can contact our customer service. (0800/95 713 or through this webform). We'll do it for you.

entries.question: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.questionInEng: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.answer: Indeed, we do sponsor some local charity projects but only with products. If you want to introduce a sponsoring request, please click here. If you want to sponsor a local non-profit organzation, click here. We'll contact you as soon as possible. ici … Si vous souhaitez soutenir une asbl locale (club de sport, ...), cliquez ici. Nous reviendrons vers vous le plus rapidement possible.

entries.question: I don't recieve the  ‘Only for you’ couponbook. What can I do?
entries.questionInEng: I don't recieve the  ‘Only for you’ couponbook. What can I do?
entries.answer: Unfortunaltely, it's impossible to send personalized offers to all our customers. That's why we make every moth a customer selection , in order to please as much customers as we can. This selection is based on several criteria such as purchase history, purchase frequency etc.... Unfortunately we can't make any exceptions.

entries.question: I don't want the ‘Only for you’couponbook anymore
entries.questionInEng: I don't want the ‘Only for you’couponbook anymore
entries.answer: To unscribe from the ‘Only for you’mailing, Please click here.

entries.question: [EN]Action en cours jusqu'au …: Delhaize shop
entries.questionInEng: [EN]Action en cours jusqu'au …: Delhaize shop
entries.answer: Details of the action
keywords: nom de l'action(à remplacer en fonction de l'action en cours)
naam van de actie(aan te passen in functue van de lopende actie)

entries.question: Can I use my vouchers when I make an online ordering?
entries.questionInEng: Can I use my vouchers when I make an online ordering?
entries.answer: Most of our instore commercial actions and promotions are also applicable for oneline orderings. Although some local actions might only be applicated in some local stores. But it could be the other way around too : some promotions are only applicable for online orderings. Most commercial actions are not applicable for home delivery services.

entries.question: Are in-store promotions also applicable on online orders?
entries.questionInEng: Are in-store promotions also applicable on online orders?
entries.answer:
Yes absolutely. You'll take benefit out of the ongoing promotions at the moment of your order confirmation. For fresh products like fruit and vegetables, a daily price is applicated.
Important to know: Our weekly promotions changes every Thursday. This means that every modification of your order, done after thursday, will cancel the promotions but will take the new promotions into account. For exemple : If you place an order on tuesday to collect on saturday, you'll get the promotions of tuesday. But if you modify your order on thursday or friday, it will cancel the original promotions of tuesday, but will applicate the new promotions of the week.

entries.question: How do I use my promotion code for my online order?
entries.questionInEng: How do I use my promotion code for my online order?
entries.answer: It's really easy! you need to introduce your code when you're on your basket page. There's a special field dedicated for promotion codes. Click to validate. Once your code is introduced, you can confirm your order. If you have a problem, don't hesitate to call our customer service (0800/95 713) or to contact them through the webform. ormulaire en ligne.

entries.questionInEng: What are E-Deals? How does it work?

Once your card linked, you'll recieve your  personalized offers (Edeals). Click on "activate your edeal" to activate the promotion on your card. Next time you'll go tho the store, present your card at the cashier and the promotion will be directly deducted.

entries.answer: Most of our instore commercial actions and promotions are also applicable for oneline orderings. Although some local actions might only be applicated in some local stores. But it could be the other way around too : some promotions are only applicable for online orderings. Most commercial actions are not applicable for home delivery services.

entries.question: I'd like to subscribe/unscribe for your newsletter
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to subscribe/unscribe for your newsletter
entries.answer: To unscribe from our newsletters, pelase click here.

entries.question: I don't recieve your advertising folder
entries.questionInEng: I don't recieve your advertising folder
entries.answer: Let's quickly solve this.To get our weekly advertising folder, please click here.

entries.question: Can I modify my communication preferences?
entries.questionInEng: Can I modify my communication preferences?
entries.answer: Please fill in this webform in order to choose your communication preferences.

entries.question: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.questionInEng: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.answer: You can go to the reception desk of your store and ask our employee to modify your details. (Please bring your loyalty card). You can also modify all your details yourself if you have an online account and your card linked to it. All you have to do is to logg in, go to "My account" /My personal details.

entries.question: I can't logg in
entries.questionInEng: I can't logg in
entries.answer: Please contact our customer service at following number : 0800 95 713 or you can fill in our webform. We'll fix it for you!

entries.question: I'd like to create an online account
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to create an online account
entries.answer: That's really easy! Go to www.somedomain.be. In the right upper corner, you'll find a tab "New at somedomain.be". Click on Register/logg in" and follow all the instructions. You'll see, it's very easy!

entries.question: Do you keep my personal details in a safety way?
entries.questionInEng: Do you keep my personal details in a safety way?
entries.answer: Our Data privacy is very important to us. If you want some detailed information about it, please read our Data Privacy statement here.

But if you add the product of the week in your basket, you'll have a 4,5€ discount on it.
important to know : If you order by phone, a call-center fee of 5€ will be applied. If you order more that 60L of drinks, there will also be an additional fee of 10€.

entries.question: Howmany products do I have to order for  2+1 or 1+1 promotions?
entries.questionInEng: Howmany products do I have to order for  2+1 or 1+1 promotions?
entries.answer: You need to select the total number of products. So if the promotion is 2+1 , you need to order 3 products. If it's a 1+1 you need to add 2 products in your basket. The free product will be deducted from your ticket.

entries.question: Can I order for a pick-up or delivery the same day?
entries.questionInEng: Can I order for a pick-up or delivery the same day?
entries.answer: Unfortunately it's not possible for the same day. But you can order till midnight the day before.

entries.question: Can I pick-up my order later than the timeslot I've chosen?
entries.questionInEng: Can I pick-up my order later than the timeslot I've chosen?
entries.answer: If you want to modify your timeslot, please logg in and go to your order history. Click on your ongoing order and click on "modify". Watch out : an order can only be modified till 10:00AM the day before the delivery/pick up. IF you want to modify it after that time, we kindly invite you to contact your store. You can find all our store numbers here.

entries.question: How can I pay my order?
entries.questionInEng: How can I pay my order?
entries.answer: you have several possibilities.You can pay by card (Barncontact, Visa, Master Card or American Express. You can also pay with electronic mealvouchers. You can't pay home delivery orders by cash nor with ecocheques.

entries.question: Can I use discount voucher on my online order?
entries.questionInEng: Can I use discount voucher on my online order?
entries.answer: Yes you can. You just have to give your voucher to our store employee when you pick up your order. The voucher will directly be deducted from your ticket. Same thing for Home deliveries : just give your voucher to the driver and he will deduct it from your ticket. Only Delhaize vouchers, suppliers' vouchers and 5€ vouchers are accepted. It's not possible for our drivers to give a 5€ voucher when 500 points are targetted. THerefor you need to go to a store.

entries.question: How can I replace an old order?
entries.questionInEng: How can I replace an old order?
entries.answer: You can add all the products of a previous order into your basket by logging in and by going into your order history. Open the order you want to "copy". You can re-add all the products in your basket, or you can just "replace the order". It's that easy! :-)

entries.question: How can I remove a product from my shopping card
entries.questionInEng: How can I remove a product from my shopping card
entries.answer: To remove a product from your shopping list, just logg into your account and click onthe part « My lists » .Click on "view list". you'll have the possibility to remove or to add some products.  It's that easy!

entries.question: Where can I check my order history?
entries.questionInEng: Where can I check my order history?
entries.answer: You can check your order history in your account. Please logg in and go to "My orders". You'll have all the overview of your placed orders.

entries.question: I forgot my password. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I forgot my password. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: Don't worry, all you need to do is go to the delhaize website and click on "Register/logg in". On the left side, you'll see "Existing customer" and "Forgot password?". Click on that last one. An email with further instructions will be send immediatly to your personal emailaddress.

entries.question: How do I make an online shopping list?
entries.questionInEng: How do I make an online shopping list?
entries.answer: If you buy some products quiete frequently, you might save them in a list. This will save your time for your next order. Once you have those products into your basket, you can click on "save as list". Later on, if you want to re-order those products, just open the list you've saved and add the products into your basket. It's that easy!

entries.question: How can I replace an old order?
entries.questionInEng: How can I replace an old order?
entries.answer: You can add all the products of a previous order into your basket by logging in and by going into your order history. Open the order you want to "copy". You can re-add all the products in your basket, or you can just "replace the order". It's that easy! :-)

entries.question: What are E-Deals? How does it work?
entries.questionInEng: What are E-Deals? How does it work?
entries.answer: E-Deals are promotions that can only be activated on your loyalty card. All you have to do is create an online account and link your loyalty card to it. Once your card linked, you'll recieve your  personalized offers (Edeals). Click on "activate your edeal" to activate the promotion on your card. Next time you'll go tho the store, present your card at the cashier and the promotion will be directly deducted.

entries.question: Are all the online commercial actions  the same as in the stores?
entries.questionInEng: Are all the online commercial actions  the same as in the stores?
entries.answer: Most of our instore commercial actions and promotions are also applicable for oneline orderings. Although some local actions might only be applicated in some local stores. But it could be the other way around too : some promotions are only applicable for online orderings. Most commercial actions are not applicable for home delivery services.

entries.question: I can't logg in
entries.questionInEng: I can't logg in
entries.answer: Please contact our customer service at following number : 0800 95 713 or you can fill in our webform. We'll fix it for you!

entries.question: How can I link my card to my online account?
entries.questionInEng: How can I link my card to my online account?
entries.answer: You can do it online through your webaccount; Or you can contact our customer service by phone (0800/95 713) or by webform.

entries.question: I didn't recieve my points
entries.questionInEng: I didn't recieve my points
entries.answer: Please go to the receptiondesk of your store or contact our customer service team (0800/95 713 or by webform). They'll fix it for you.

entries.question: Where can I order a Delhaize Loyalty card?
entries.questionInEng: Where can I order a Delhaize Loyalty card?
entries.answer: You have two possibilities to order your card : You can go to the reception desk of your store and ask for a loyalty card. Or you can order one online. Just loggin to your webaccount and click on "order a pluscard". You'll get your card at home within the 10 days.

entries.question: I've lost my Loyalty Card. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I've lost my Loyalty Card. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: You can ask a new card at the receptiondesk of your store. If you have your old (lost) loyalty card number, they can transfer your balance of points. If you don't know you old(lost) number anymore, don't worry. Feel free to contact our Customer Service by phone 0800/95 713 or by webform....they'll help you further.

entries.question: I have several Loyalty Cards. How can I add all points on one card?
entries.questionInEng: I have several Loyalty Cards. How can I add all points on one card?
entries.answer: Yes you can. Please contact our customer service by phone (0800/95 713) or by webform. They'll take care of merging all your cards.

entries.question: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.questionInEng: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.answer: You can go to the reception desk of your store and ask our employee to modify your details. (Please bring your loyalty card). You can also modify all your details yourself if you have an online account and your card linked to it. All you have to do is to logg in, go to "My account" /My personal details.

entries.question: How and where can I check my balance of points?
entries.questionInEng: How and where can I check my balance of points?
entries.answer: You have twe possibilites to check your balance of points . Your balance of points is always mentioned at the end of your ticket. Otherwise, you can also check it online once your card has been linked to your account.

entries.question: I want to cancel my card. What do I have to do?
entries.questionInEng: I want to cancel my card. What do I have to do?
entries.answer: You have two options : You can go to the receptiondesk of your store or you can contact our customer service. (0800/95 713 or through this webform). We'll do it for you.

entries.question: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.questionInEng: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.answer: Indeed, we do sponsor some local charity projects but only with products. If you want to introduce a sponsoring request, please click here. If you want to sponsor a local non-profit organzation, click here. We'll contact you as soon as possible. ici … Si vous souhaitez soutenir une asbl locale (club de sport, ...), cliquez ici. Nous reviendrons vers vous le plus rapidement possible.

entries.question: I don't recieve the  ‘Only for you’ couponbook. What can I do?
entries.questionInEng: I don't recieve the  ‘Only for you’ couponbook. What can I do?
entries.answer: Unfortunaltely, it's impossible to send personalized offers to all our customers. That's why we make every moth a customer selection , in order to please as much customers as we can. This selection is based on several criteria such as purchase history, purchase frequency etc.... Unfortunately we can't make any exceptions.

entries.question: I don't want the ‘Only for you’couponbook anymore
entries.questionInEng: I don't want the ‘Only for you’couponbook anymore
entries.answer: To unscribe from the ‘Only for you’mailing, Please click here.

entries.question: [EN]Action en cours jusqu'au …: Delhaize shop
entries.questionInEng: [EN]Action en cours jusqu'au …: Delhaize shop
entries.answer: Details of the action
keywords: nom de l'action(à remplacer en fonction de l'action en cours)
naam van de actie(aan te passen in functue van de lopende actie)

entries.question: Can I use my vouchers when I make an online ordering?
entries.questionInEng: Can I use my vouchers when I make an online ordering?
entries.answer: Most of our instore commercial actions and promotions are also applicable for oneline orderings. Although some local actions might only be applicated in some local stores. But it could be the other way around too : some promotions are only applicable for online orderings. Most commercial actions are not applicable for home delivery services.

entries.question: Are in-store promotions also applicable on online orders?
entries.questionInEng: Are in-store promotions also applicable on online orders?
entries.answer:
Yes absolutely. You'll take benefit out of the ongoing promotions at the moment of your order confirmation. For fresh products like fruit and vegetables, a daily price is applicated.
Important to know: Our weekly promotions changes every Thursday. This means that every modification of your order, done after thursday, will cancel the promotions but will take the new promotions into account. For exemple : If you place an order on tuesday to collect on saturday, you'll get the promotions of tuesday. But if you modify your order on thursday or friday, it will cancel the original promotions of tuesday, but will applicate the new promotions of the week.

entries.question: How do I use my promotion code for my online order?
entries.questionInEng: How do I use my promotion code for my online order?
entries.answer: It's really easy! you need to introduce your code when you're on your basket page. There's a special field dedicated for promotion codes. Click to validate. Once your code is introduced, you can confirm your order. If you have a problem, don't hesitate to call our customer service (0800/95 713) or to contact them through the webform. ormulaire en ligne.

entries.question: What are E-Deals? How does it work?
entries.questionInEng: What are E-Deals? How does it work?
entries.answer: E-Deals are promotions that can only be activated on your loyalty card. All you have to do is create an online account and link your loyalty card to it. Once your card linked, you'll recieve your  personalized offers (Edeals). Click on "activate your edeal" to activate the promotion on your card. Next time you'll go tho the store, present your card at the cashier and the promotion will be directly deducted.

entries.question: Are all the online commercial actions  the same as in the stores?
entries.questionInEng: Are all the online commercial actions  the same as in the stores?
entries.answer: Most of our instore commercial actions and promotions are also applicable for oneline orderings. Although some local actions might only be applicated in some local stores. But it could be the other way around too : some promotions are only applicable for online orderings. Most commercial actions are not applicable for home delivery services.

entries.question: I'd like to subscribe/unscribe for your newsletter
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to subscribe/unscribe for your newsletter
entries.answer: To unscribe from our newsletters, pelase click here.

entries.question: I don't recieve your advertising folder
entries.questionInEng: I don't recieve your advertising folder
entries.answer: Let's quickly solve this.To get our weekly advertising folder, please click here.

entries.question: Can I modify my communication preferences?
entries.questionInEng: Can I modify my communication preferences?
entries.answer: Please fill in this webform in order to choose your communication preferences.

entries.question: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.questionInEng: How can I modify my personal details?
entries.answer: You can go to the reception desk of your store and ask our employee to modify your details. (Please bring your loyalty card). You can also modify all your details yourself if you have an online account and your card linked to it. All you have to do is to logg in, go to "My account" /My personal details.

entries.question: I can't logg in
entries.questionInEng: I can't logg in
entries.answer: Please contact our customer service at following number : 0800 95 713 or you can fill in our webform. We'll fix it for you!

entries.question: I'd like to create an online account
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to create an online account
entries.answer: That's really easy! Go to www.somedomain.be. In the right upper corner, you'll find a tab "New at somedomain.be". Click on Register/logg in" and follow all the instructions. You'll see, it's very easy!

entries.question: Do you keep my personal details in a safety way?
entries.questionInEng: Do you keep my personal details in a safety way?
entries.answer: Our Data privacy is very important to us. If you want some detailed information about it, please read our Data Privacy statement here.

entries.question: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.questionInEng: Sponsoring and local actions : Can Delhaize sponsor my local event?
entries.answer: Indeed, we do sponsor some local charity projects but only with products. If you want to introduce a sponsoring request, please click here. If you want to sponsor a local non-profit organzation, click here. We'll contact you as soon as possible. ici. Si vous souhaitez soutenir une asbl locale (club de sport, ...), cliquez ici. Nous reviendrons vers vous le plus rapidement possible.

entries.question: I'd like to work for somedomain. What do I need to do?
entries.questionInEng: I'd like to work for somedomain. What do I need to do?
entries.answer: That's great news! You can find all our vacancies on following platform. We'll keep our fingers crossed for your application!
